Posts.Content: Dec 15, 2018 02:12PM Mimi2six wrote: I formally requested pathology report and received results within the hour. The next day, after 3 PM a cma called me to report ductal carcinoma in situ. I asked her if there was anything else, she said no-just need to set up appt. I set up the appt and again asked the cma if there was anything else-she said no. I told her I had obtained my results through medical records and the results also reported invasive carcinoma stage 2. She fessed up and said she didn’t want me to cry. I told her the truth is appreciated and I had known the truth for over 24 hours. The results had been called to their office two full days before that as the pathology report listed the time, date, and person to whom results were reported. I felt sorry for her, she should not have had the burden of reporting this news. I told her it was ok and she was totally dumped on:/ she got choked up-poor kid
Posts.Title: Anyone have a benign BIRADS 5 rated mammo? kec1972 TB90
